originalText.text: Wonderful bedside manner. Very professional and knowledgeable. Listens to his patients. Easy to schedule appointments.

text.text: Wonderful bedside manner. Very professional and knowledgeable. Listens to his patients. Easy to schedule appointments.

originalText.text: One of the kindest and best bedside manner doctors  ever. I have had multiple, chronic illnesses and in the nearly 20 years under his care, he has been always extraordinary caring and professional. Even a sciatic nerve incident was taken care swiftly by a shot on the correct nerve point. Highly recommend Dr. Basit Q.

originalText.text: Good bedside manner. Unreliable in providing records to the Visiting Nurse Service. Send my 93 year old mother in law to the hospital despite her having an advance directive indicating comfort care only and no hospitalization unless it was the only way to receive palliative care. He was gone over the memorial day weekend and didn't arrange any medical review of her infected feet in his absence. These became very painful and precipitated her death.

originalText.text: Dr. Qayyum has been my primary care doctor for the past 10 years. He is a very caring and knowledgeable doctor and treats you in a professional yet personal way. I would highly recommend Dr. Qayyum to anyone who is looking for a doctor. I have recommended him to 3 of my colleagues these past years who all have been very content with his services.
